long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn your Google calendar events into time entries with LawBillity’s Chrome extension and save even more time! Getting started is simple, click ‘Add to Chrome’ then follow the steps to connect your LawBillity account. Now you’re ready-set-go!

How it works:
1. Go to your Google calendar and click on the entry you want to sync with LawBillity
2. Within the entry you will see “Time Entry” click on this to add/edit details
3. Once you have finished entering details click on ‘Save Time Entry’

Your calendar event is now a time entry within LawBillity!
 
If you have any questions or need help to setup the extension contact us at support@ebillity.com. Our support is always free!


LawBillity Overview

LawBillity automates employee timekeeping to improve efficiency and increase profitability. Designed to streamline time tracking for payroll, client billing and productivity. 

Every account includes; weekly timesheets, timers or time cards, gps tracking, manager approvals, free integrations, time clock app, mobile apps for iOS and Android, real-time secure backups, live reports, customizable dashboard, multiple currencies, global time zones, expense tracking, job cost reporting and client billing.
